QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(left(cast(c.patid as varchar), 7) || cast(c.consid as varchar) as bigint) as visitDetailId, c.patid, c.consdate, c.staffid, c.pracid, case when m.cleansedreadcode is null then m.snomedctconceptid else m.cleansedreadcode end as key, case when m.cleansedreadcode is null then concat(concat(cast(m.snomedctconceptid as varchar),'-'),m.term) else concat(concat(m.cleansedreadcode,'-'),m.term) end as source_value from {sc}.consultation c left join {sc}.lookup_emismedicaldictionary m on c.consmedcodeid = m.medcodeid join {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND c.patid = ch.PERSON_ID where c.consdate is not NULL order by c.patid
